bioAsHtml:
Vincent is a Senior Data Engineer who's been hacking for several years with Scala, Akka and Spark. He's co-founded ThinkDeep AI, a startup which help companies implement big data and machine learning solutions.

With a long time interest for machine learning and a strong engineering background, he tries to take the best of both worlds by using big data stacks and functional programming patterns to scale machine learning solutions.

He's one of the organizers of the Functional Programming Meetup and Machine Learning Meetup in Bordeaux and the PAPIs.io international conference.

acceptedTalks.title: How I ditched my Big Data Hadoop cluster for my laptop (while greatly improving performances)
